com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet

Interface RequestContextFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRequestContextFacade, HystrixRequestContextFacade, ThreadLocalRequestContextFacade

    public interface RequestContextFacade
    This class provides an abstraction for managing RequestContexts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentRequestContext

        com.google.common.base.Optional<RequestContext> getCurrentRequestContext()
        Returns:
        The current RequestContext, if present.

      • setCurrentContext

        void setCurrentContext(RequestContext requestContext)
        Sets the current RequestContext.

      • removeCurrentContext

        void removeCurrentContext()
        Removes the current RequestContext.

      • getCurrentRequest

        com.google.common.base.Optional<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> getCurrentRequest()
        Returns:
        The HttpServletRequest of the current request, if present.

      • getRequestContextProperty

        <T> T getRequestContextProperty(String name,
                                Class<T> type)
                         throws RequestContextPropertyException
        Returns:
        The value of the given property from the current RequestContext.
        Throws:
        RequestContextPropertyException - If no RequestContext is available, the property has the wrong type, or a property with the given name cannot be found.
